scripts.meme-radar:dev: ts-node -e "import('./src/pipeline/meme-radar-pipeline').then(m => { const { MemeRadarPipeline } = m; const { loadConfig } = require('./src/config/meme-radar-config'); const config = loadConfig('development'); const pipeline = new MemeRadarPipeline(config); pipeline.initialize().then(() => pipeline.startMonitoring()); })"
scripts.meme-radar:scan: ts-node -e "import('./src/pipeline/meme-radar-pipeline').then(m => { const { MemeRadarPipeline } = m; const { loadConfig } = require('./src/config/meme-radar-config'); const config = loadConfig('development'); const pipeline = new MemeRadarPipeline(config); pipeline.initialize().then(() => pipeline.runScan()).then(console.log); })"
